commit_scope: Repair host-runner executor reliability by making Cursor node shim self-heal compatible with --use-system-ca hosts, keeping Cursor binaries at their original install path, selecting Cursor binaries only when their runtime layout includes colocated node/index assets, preserving existing Codex OAuth session files when AGENT_CODEX_OAUTH_SESSION_B64 is present, and attempting one Codex OAuth relogin before OAuth-only refresh-token reuse retries.

commands: cd api && pytest -q tests/test_agent_runner_tool_failure_telemetry.py && ruff check scripts/agent_runner.py tests/test_agent_runner_tool_failure_telemetry.py

phase_gate.blocked_reason: Awaiting PR merge, production deploy, and hosted proof rerun confirming codex/claude/cursor all complete on host runner.

e2e_validation.expected_behavior_delta: Host runner can complete one execution path each for codex, claude, and cursor; Cursor self-heals unsupported --use-system-ca node flag via compatibility shim, avoids promoted binaries without runtime assets, and resolves to layout-healthy agent binaries only; Codex refresh-token failures retry in OAuth mode with one relogin heal attempt while preserving existing auth session files.
test_flows: Create codex task and verify completion using oauth auth mode (no api_key fallback marker).
Create claude task and verify completed status with expected proof token.
Create cursor task and verify completed status with expected proof token and no missing /usr/local/bin/node error.
